Figures and tables
=================
Use the tikzDevice, it will blow your mind ^[footnote: why not?]:

```{r setup}
library(knitr)
knit_hooks$set(plot = function(x, options) {
  if ('tikz' %in% options$dev && !options$external) {
    hook_plot_tex(x, options)
  } else hook_plot_md(x, options)
})
```
